::: TRANSANULAS looked at the bot in front of them...his stupidity almost 
matched Liono Prime's. Quickstrike seemed to be taking care of the situation, 
but the forest was getting hotter and they had little time.......:::

::: TRANSANULAS ::: Enough of this! You can stay here and burn, but we shall 
not!

::: Still in his vheicle mode, the transmetal spider releases a batch of 
several cluster missles towrds Crow Lord and then speeds off as a nearby tree 
falls to the ground ::::

~~~~~~~~~~

::: HELL BEAST looks to RAMPAGE ::: Ah, the battle begins. Rampage, I do hope 
you know what your getting into, this can be very stressful. And Im sure you 
do know any major damages to the ship, and other bots is your responsibility.

::: He turns to the crew ::: Alright, call Bright Blade and Gangon, Pheniox, 
and Jackle. Tell them to return to base so we can attack, as well as all the 
other predacons.

::: BLACK ARACNIA nods and begins to send the transmissions ::: 

::: GREMLIN looks to Mosquitor ::: Hey, are you ready to kick some Maximal 
ass?

::: HELL BEAST ::: Gremlin, language....I do run a strict ship here.

~~~~~~~~

::: MEGATRON blasts at Bright Blade from the cover of a large bolder, as Rat 
Trap fires at Gangon :::

::: MEGATRON ::: Damn Predacons....they should have joined me!

::: RAT TRAP ::: Yeah, but whats our next move?

::: MEGATRON thinks for a moment ::: well, the Predacons are going to attack 
the Maximals shortly....I suppose we can take advantage of this!

::: RAT TRAP, between blasting at Gangon ::: How can we take advantage of 
this?

::: MEGATRON says with a grim smile ::: While they blast each other, we can 
sneak inside and get rid of the Auto-bots! At last, my mission will be 
complete....

::: RAT TRAP ::: Ah...Im a former maximal....if that happenes I would 
kinda..die.

::: MEGATRON says boldly ::: Your death will be remembered....your live given 
for a greater cause. Predacon across the galaxy will celebrate your myrterdom.

::: RAT TRAP ::: No...I dont think that might be such a good idea...I mean I 
want to help the Predacons and all, but by me dying-

::: MEGATRON grabs RAT TRAP ::: Silence! You will help or I will......just 
pray i dont think of a more grousome death!

::: RAT TRAP swallows and salutes MEGATRON. Now he was in troble, and he had 
to make sure he didnt die for MEGATRON's stupid cause...he would have to do 
something. :::
